lead_paragraph: GUTMAN--Robert W. The members of The Lotos Club mourn the loss of their distinguished colleague and longtime friend, Robert Gutman, and send condolences to his family. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GUTMAN, ROBERT W
